ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: You don't want to waste valuable exp and potential gold by running back to base. Also grabbing this at the start leaves the courier open for the other lanes.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Make sure to ward their pull camp so they can't bring the creep equilibrium near their tower.
ItemTooltips.tpscroll: Always have these handy. I tend to keep at least 2 on me at all times.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: These are very important for the extra mobility and early last hit damage.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Buy this before the force staff if you are the dedicated builder otherwise skip this item.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: Build this if your team is very lacking with stuns and crowd control spells. This can be helpful to set up shackle shot as well.
ItemTooltips.orchid: Orchid is a great item for the extra attack speed and especially for the mana regen. If you're being asked to semi-carry this item is a must.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Use this to set up shackle shot and to use as an extra escape. Windrunner becomes extremely hard to kill once this is built.
ItemTooltips.sphere: If you need survivability or extra insurance then build this. Its especially useful if you are designated to hold a gem.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: If you're at the point where you will need to build this item, chances are their carries are going to have some sort of evasion. This will counter that while giving you a nice damage and attack speed boost.

AbilityTooltips.windrunner_shackleshot: Not the most stable of stuns but it can be very powerful if you latch 2 heroes together. Don't wait for the perfect shackle, just keep throwing them out there if it has a chance to latch.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_powershot: If you get harassed hard in lane use powershot to last hit creeps or to harass their team back from a long distance.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_windrun: You need windrun at level 1. Avoid taking as much damage as possible so don't hesitate to activate it when trading hits with the other team.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_focusfire: A fairly weak ability early on. Once you can get 2-3 ranks of it then its more worth it. Use this to push towers and if you get an orchid this can pump out a lot of damage quickly.
